articles.title: Boston residents say they feel safer downtown compared to last year in new survey
articles.description:
Far fewer residents said they felt “less safe” compared to the beginning of the year than in a similar survey conducted in 2024.

The post Boston residents say they feel safer downtown compared to last year in new survey appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston residents report feeling safer downtown compared to last year's survey.
Fewer residents expressed feeling 'less safe' than in early 2024.
Increased safety perception may boost local business and tourism in Boston.
